boardgame.name: Cytosis: A Cell Biology Board Game
Cytosis: un juego de transporte celular.
Микромир: Биология клетки
boardgame.description: Cytosis: A Cell Building Game is a worker placement game that takes place inside a human cell. Players start out with a number of workers and on a player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s turn, they will place one of their workers in any available location within that cell. Some of the locations provide players with resources (e.g., mRNA, ATP); some with actions (e.g., convert resources, collect cards). Resources are used to build enzymes, hormones and/or receptors, which score Health Points. The player with the most Health Points at the end of the game wins!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: #62: Six Tasty Games; Caverna on tap; Book of Dragons preview; Gamers for Cures gaming marathon
30. Devon Dice podcast: Not Too Busy To Play Games
74 – The Family Gamers Podcast – Super PAX U Super Show
Vox Republica 141: Science Is Your Friend

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Kickstarter
Played once - like new condition. Beautiful production but the game was not for us. Postage $8-12 depending on location.

Game: Cytosis: A Cell Biology Game (Deluxe Collector_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition/Kickstarter/Limited) Condition: new in shrinkwrap Language: English Thanks in advance for ordering! That should be the first choice for non-EU customers.) Pick up the game at my game store (no shipping cost) Shipping: always insured and with tracking Germany: 5,99€ for the first item card games or smaller boxes might be cheaper (please contact me beforehand) EU: 13,99€ up to 2kg 15,99€ up to 5kg 20,99€ up to 10kg Rest of the world: Please contact me before purchasing an item to clarify the shipping costs. Please contact frank@spieleberatung.com and I will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. This is the Premium Collector Edition. Includes all Kickstarter unlocks. Shipping costs will be the actual cost of shipping with Deutsche Post/DHL, Hermes or DPD. Starting at around 5€ (incl tracking). Please ask for the detailed costs. SEPA bank transfer preferred. Paypal _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;to a friend_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; is also acceptable. See details to this product on the Kickstarter page: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/geniusgames/cytosis-a-cell-biology-board-game
Played once

Brand new in factory seal. Buyer pays shipping from zip 91361. Game states “Collector’s Edition” and “Virus Expansion included” in foil print on the box. Also contains 7 variable player powers, which I believe is not included in the base game.
Never played. £7 postage via UPS. UK addresses only please
